attribute.description: A value of "true" indicates that ICEfaces rendering Direct-to-DOM should be applied to the current view. A value of "false" indicates that stock JSF rendering should be used. "true" is the default, since the presences of this tag indicates the use of ICEfaces.
attribute.name: render

attribute.description: A value of "true" indicates that ARIA support applied to the current view. "true" is the default value. ARIA can be enabled application level by setting following context parameter "org.icefaces.aria.enabled" to true in web.xml If ARIA is enabled application level, this attribute can disable ARIA for current view.
attribute.name: ariaEnabled

attribute.description: A space-delimited list of components that will have their requisite resources pre-loaded on this page. The pre-loading allows the components to function correctly even if they are later added to the page dynamically. The values "none" (which is the default) and "all" are also valid. The value of this attribute on a page takes precedence over the values specified by the context parameter org.icefaces.mandatoryResourceConfiguration.
attribute.name: mandatoryResource

attribute.description: A value of "true" indicates that faces messages are persisted across single submits. This attribute takes precedence over the org.icefaces.messagePersistence context parameter on a per view basis.
attribute.name: messagePersistence

attribute.description: The group name the current view should be added to.
attribute.name: group

attribute.description: Perform a singleSubmit in reponse to blur events.
attribute.name: submitOnBlur
